actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway demonstration project to extend Pennsylvania State Route 33 to provide a limited access highway to connect Interstate Routes I-78 and I-80.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to implement a highway demonstration project in the vicinity of Bethlehem, Pennsylvania, to extend Route 33 on the Federal-aid primary system and to report the project results to the Congress by January 31, 1993. Authorizes appropriations for such project for FY 1988 through 1992.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway demonstration project to extend Pennsylvania State Route 33 to provide a limited access highway to connect Interstate Routes I-78 and I-80.
